title: Skate Kitchen
creator_credit: Bow + Arrow Entertainment, Pulse Films, RT Features, Crystal Moselle, Matthew Perniciaro, Rodrigo Teixeira, Fletcher Chancey and Julia Nottingham
brief_description: Camille’s life as a lonely suburban teenager changes dramatically when she befriends a group of girl skateboarders. As she journeys deeper into this raw New York City subculture, she begins to understand the true meaning of friendship as well as her inner self.

constellations_other.name: Skate or die
constellations_other.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

creator_credit_for_label: Bow + Arrow Entertainment, Pulse Films, RT Features, Crystal Moselle, Matthew Perniciaro, Rodrigo Teixeira, Fletcher Chancey and Julia Nottingham
